title: Leauge took me out of Promos
body: Ok so i was currently in my gold 4 promos and i had a free win after winning 2 games  (The jhin and Rammus game), and i had a free win shown in the 2nd gyazo. I lost the 2nd game as jinx and won my last as rammus. i got to check my rank or whatever and it still says gold 5 95 lp. I am so confused right now like what am i suppose to do ///// https://gyazo.com/7a7db00f995f31e22b06ee863db207b8 // https://gyazo.com/c6e36d1ed207c15b50dda71dac20ad1f

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and found a few queue dodges.  [Queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) will automatically count as a loss during a series and also disqualifies the [promo helper win](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q2).  Your best bet is to stay committed and connected during champion select to prevent those penalties, and even a lower priority queue.  I hope that helps clear things up, and I wish you all the best in your ranked games!
If you believe there was an error feel free to contact riot support. (2 lazy 2 link it's at the top of the page)

To supplement your post;

---

Communicate with Riot’s [Account Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


 * Under the secondary select **Account.**


  * For the tertiary category select **Management**
